title: The Butterfly Affair
description: HEARTS ARE EVERYWHERE. One is drawn on a strangler's rope. One is about to stop beating. Three are tangled in love. Dee Tamarack has two problems: someone camouflaged as an ordinary citizen is killing in the small town of Mustang, Missouri...and she's falling in love with her husband's colleague, a self-taught naturalist with a passion for butterflies. Oh, and she decides to find out who the killer is. Bad move. Intense and rich, this murder mystery packs lots of surprises, right up to the startling, explosive end.
author: Robin Goodfellow
